Package com.iontrading.mkv.events

Interface MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener

  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public interface MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener
    This listener is used for on-behalf-of requests of by-feature licenses. Through MkvLicenseManager.requestOnBehalfOf(String, String, String, int) the application can request an on-behalf-of by-feature licenses. The listeners to process the license request outcome can be installed via MkvLicenseManager.addOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener(String, MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseListener) and it will be installed on a per virtual-component basis.
    See Also:
    MkvLicenseManager, MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onAcquired​(MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseEvent event)
      Event is generated when at least one feature has been acquired.
      void onFailed​(MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseEvent event, MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseError error, String message)
      Event generated when no feature was acquired.
      void onLost​(Collection<String> lostFeatures)

    • Method Detail

      • onAcquired

        void onAcquired​(MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseEvent event)
        Event is generated when at least one feature has been acquired.
        Parameters:
        event - the event containing the name of the feature and the current amount of requested and acquired licenses.

      • onFailed

        void onFailed​(MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseEvent event,
              MkvOnBehalfOfFeatureLicenseError error,
              String message)
        Event generated when no feature was acquired.
        Parameters:
        event - the event containing the name of the feature and the current amount of requested and acquired licenses.
        error - the reason of failure.
        message - an optional error message.

      • onLost

        void onLost​(Collection<String> lostFeatures)
        Event generated on losing connection with the Platform.
        Parameters:
        lostFeatures - the lost features.
